title: Litfried's author page
content:
Litfried (pronunciation: //LIT-freed// pronouns: they/them), n.: one time writer of SCPs, lecturer in computer science, lover of drum and bass music, cats, and being outside. Hasn't been around for many years; all that free time as a student has evaporated.

Love my writing? Why not [http://www.mixcloud.com/litfried/ listen to some of my DJ mixes]?
